sample_rows.title: Robot operating device
sample_rows.abstract: The invention provides a robot operation device which can improve operation efficiency by reducing changes of the standing position or posture of an operator. The robot operation device operates a robot (10) having a plurality of joints (21a, 22a, 23a, 24a, 25a, 26a), and is provided with an operation unit (30), wherein the operation unit (30) transmits a signal corresponding to the operation of an operator to a control device of the robot (10), the operation unit (30) is configured to be detachably mounted on a mounting member (12), the mounting member (12) is fixed to an arm member (25) of the robot (10), and the arm member (25) is arranged at a position closer to a base end side than a joint (26a) at the forefront end side among the plurality of joints (21a, 22a, 23a, 24a, 25a, 26 a).

sample_rows.title: Power conversion system, controller and control method
sample_rows.abstract: The application discloses a power conversion system, a controller and a control method. The power conversion system comprises a switch-off array and a power converter, wherein: the outputs of the plurality of shut-off devices are connected in series to form a group string, a plurality of groups of the series-parallel connection form the shut-off device array, the output end of the shut-off device array is connected with the input end of the power converter, and the input end of each shut-off device is connected with at least one direct-current power supply; the controller is used for sending a turn-off instruction to each turn-off device when receiving a rapid turn-off command, controlling the power converter to discharge the input capacitor of the power converter, and stopping discharging the capacitor until the input voltage of the power converter is reduced to a preset value. The present application enables the power converter input voltage to be reduced below a safe voltage.

sample_rows.title: Method and system for marking sleep states
sample_rows.abstract: A system, computer-readable storage medium, and method capable of directly or indirectly estimating a user's sleep state based on sensor data from motion sensors and/or optical sensors.

sample_rows.title: Quick-acting complex tablets containing dutasteride and Ta Dalafei
sample_rows.abstract: The present invention relates to the quick-acting complex tablets containing dutasteride and Ta Dalafei, specifically, it is made of the first particulate composition of the dutasteride containing effective component and the second particulate composition of the Ta Dalafei containing effective component, first particulate composition also contains polyethylene glycol -15- hydroxy stearic acid ester other than the dutasteride, polyethylene glycol -6- glyceryl linoleate, acetic acid amber hydroxypropyl methylcellulose, colloidal silicon dioxide, second particulate composition other than the Ta Dalafei also containing low degree of substitution hydroxypropyl cellulose and, containing mannitol, the disintegrating agent of microcrystalline cellulose and the second potassium phosphate.

sample_rows.title: Modular conveyor, conveyor module and method for coupling modules of a modular conveyor
sample_rows.abstract: A modular conveyor comprising a plurality of modules successive in a conveying direction, each module comprising a body portion having a conveying surface for conveying products thereon, which body portion is hinged, during use, to the body portion of the successive module by a hinge pin. The splice module is adjustable from an assembly position to an operating position. In the working position, the hinge pin can be introduced from outside the body into the receiving space formed by the successive modules or can be taken out of the receiving space to outside the body as a result of the hinge pin being released by the body to move in the longitudinal direction and/or transverse direction of its longitudinal axis. In the operating position, the hinge pin is retained in the receiving space formed by the body parts of the successive modules, since the movement of the hinge pin in both the longitudinal direction and the transverse direction of its longitudinal axis is limited by the body parts.
